# CloudedDeals — Complete Reference

> Every deal from every Las Vegas dispensary, updated daily at 8 AM.

CloudedDeals (https://cloudeddeals.com) is a free cannabis deal comparison platform for Las Vegas. We scrape menus from 27+ licensed dispensaries every morning at 8 AM Pacific, classify products into categories, calculate deal scores, and display the best prices. No account is needed to browse deals.

---

## How It Works

1. Every morning at 8 AM PT, automated scrapers visit the online menus of 27+ licensed Las Vegas dispensaries
2. Products are extracted, classified (flower, vapes, edibles, concentrates, pre-rolls), and priced
3. Each deal receives a score from 0-100 based on how the price compares to the market average for that product type and weight
4. Deals are published on cloudeddeals.com, searchable and filterable by dispensary, category, price, and zone

---

## Coverage

### Dispensary Zones

- **Strip**: Dispensaries on or near the Las Vegas Strip (tourists)
- **Downtown**: Dispensaries in the downtown / Fremont area
- **Local**: Dispensaries throughout the Las Vegas valley (locals)

### Product Categories

| Category | What's Included |
|----------|----------------|
| Flower | Cannabis buds — eighths, quarters, halves, ounces |
| Vapes | Cartridges, pods, disposable vape pens |
| Edibles | Gummies, chocolates, beverages, capsules |
| Concentrates | Wax, shatter, live resin, rosin, diamonds |
| Pre-Rolls | Pre-rolled joints, infused pre-rolls, multi-packs |

### Dispensaries Tracked (27)

**Strip Zone:**
- Planet 13 — 2548 W Desert Inn Rd (world's largest dispensary)
- Curaleaf Strip — 4550 S Maryland Pkwy, Suite 8
- Thrive Strip — 2755 S Industrial Rd, Suite 100
- Greenlight Downtown — 1455 S Grand Central Pkwy

**Local Zone (Henderson, Decatur, etc.):**
- The Dispensary - Gibson — 50 N Gibson Rd, Suite 170 & 175
- The Dispensary - Decatur — 5347 S Decatur Blvd
- Medizin — 4850 W Sunset Rd, Suite 130
- The Grove — 4647 Swenson St
- Oasis — 1800 Industrial Rd, Suite 180
- Cultivate Spring — 4055 S Buffalo Dr, Suite 100
- Cultivate Durango — 6540 Blue Diamond Rd, Suite 180
- Deep Roots Cheyenne — 3400 Western Ave
- Deep Roots Craig — 3400 Craig Rd
- Deep Roots Blue Diamond — 7980 Blue Diamond Rd
- Deep Roots Parkson — 4563 Blue Diamond Rd
- Mint Paradise — 4609 W Flamingo Rd
- Mint Rainbow — 6530 S Rainbow Blvd, Suite 1
- Thrive Sahara — 1112 S Commerce St
- Thrive Cheyenne — 3890 N Rancho Dr
- Thrive Main — 6870 S Rainbow Blvd, Suite 120
- Beyond Hello Sahara — 1921 Western Ave
- Beyond Hello Twain — 4255 S Durango Dr

**Curaleaf Locations:**
- Curaleaf Western — 1736 Western Ave
- Curaleaf Cheyenne — 3690 N Rancho Dr
- Curaleaf The Reef — 3400 Western Ave, Suite 101

**Greenlight:**
- Greenlight Paradise — 7575 Norman Rockwell Ln

---

## Page Structure

### Main Pages
| URL | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| https://cloudeddeals.com | Homepage — today's top deals across all dispensaries |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/las-vegas-dispensary-deals | All deals hub — every deal from every dispensary |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/strip-dispensary-deals | Strip-zone deals for tourists |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/downtown-dispensary-deals | Downtown zone deals for Fremont/Arts District visitors |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/local-dispensary-deals | Off-strip deals for locals — Henderson, NLV, Spring Valley |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/blog | Guides, comparisons, and tips for Las Vegas cannabis |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/browse | Browse all dispensaries |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/search | Search deals by keyword |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/about | About CloudedDeals |

### Category Pages
| URL | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/flower | All flower deals with prices and scores |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/vapes | All vape deals |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/edibles | All edible deals |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/concentrates | All concentrate deals |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/deals/prerolls | All pre-roll deals |

### Blog Posts
| URL | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| https://cloudeddeals.com/blog/best-dispensary-deals-vegas-strip | Guide to Strip dispensary deals with real prices |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/blog/cheapest-dispensary-las-vegas | Price comparison across all 27+ dispensaries |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/blog/planet-13-deals-worth-it | Planet 13 pricing analysis and recommendations |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/blog/vegas-dispensary-deals-today | How daily deals work and where to find them |
| https://cloudeddeals.com/blog/best-vape-deals-las-vegas | Vape deal guide: carts, pods, and disposables |

### Dispensary Pages (27 pages)
Each dispensary has a dedicated page at `https://cloudeddeals.com/dispensary/{slug}` showing:
- Today's deals at that dispensary
- Dispensary location and zone
- About section with local context
- Links to other dispensaries in the same zone

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How often are deals updated?**
A: Every day at 8 AM Pacific. We scrape live dispensary menus each morning.

**Q: How many dispensaries do you cover?**
A: 27+ licensed Las Vegas dispensaries across the Strip, Downtown, and local neighborhoods.

**Q: Is CloudedDeals free?**
A: Yes, completely free. No account required to browse deals.

**Q: What is the deal score?**
A: A 0-100 score based on how the deal price compares to the average market price for that product type and weight. Higher scores mean better deals.

**Q: Do you cover dispensaries outside Las Vegas?**
A: Currently Las Vegas only. Multi-state expansion is planned.

**Q: Can I buy products through CloudedDeals?**
A: No. CloudedDeals is a comparison and discovery tool. We link to dispensary menus where you can place orders directly.

---
